| Overview              = The '''Corps of Royal Marines''' (RM) is an amphibious light infantry and also one of the five fighting arms of the [[Royal Navy (Earth-616)|Her Majesty's Naval Service]]. As a highly specialized and adaptable elite light infantry force, the Royal Marines are trained for rapid deployment worldwide and capable of dealing with a wide range of threats. 
| History                 = 
Royal Marine commando; [[William Fairbairn (Earth-616)|William Fairbairn]] trained both [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Steve Rogers]],{{r|Marvels Project Vol 1 5}} and [[James Buchanan Barnes (Earth-616)|Bucky]] in close quarters combat during [[World War II]].{{r|Captain America Vol 5 12}}

[[Joseph MacTaggert (Earth-616)|Joseph MacTaggert]] served in the Royal Marines before his political career.{{r|X-Men Vol 1 127}}

The Royal Marines were involved in defending London during the [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrull]] [[Secret Invasion]].{{r|Captain Britain and MI-13 Vol 1 3}}
